Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameJUpload project on Sourceforge
DescriptionJava Multiple File Upload Applet (JUpload) takes care of the limitation posed by traditional HTML upload forms by allowing you to upload a whole directory and the files within it with a single click. Optionally, it allows simple picture management. JUpload works also as a standard standalone Java application, and can be embedded in any Java application to do HTTP or FTP file transfert.
Homepagehttp://jupload.sourceforge.net

Project Organization

This project does not belong to an organization.
